product_name: Womo Designs Accessory Kit - GoPro HD Camera
long_description: Compatable with the Womo Designs Handlebar Chassis, this Accessory Kit for GoPro allows the attachment for your GoPro HD camera (sold separately). Mounting hardware is machined out of durable thermoplastic to securely mount accessories without damaging the mating surfaces. Womo Designs Handlebar Chassis required (sold separately); chassis can accept a total of 2 accessories.
short_description: Compatable with the Womo Designs Handlebar Chassis, this Accessory Kit for GoPro allows the attachment for your GoPro HD camera (sold separately).
